casebody.data:
Robert Allen RAY, Appellant, v. Joseph R. BRIERLEY, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution, Pittsburgh, Pa. No. 18131. United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted on Briefs June 15, 1970. Decided on June 29, 1970. Robert A. Ray, pro se. Joseph Martin Gelman, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Pittsburgh, Pa., William C. Sennett, Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, Pa., for appellee.

Before McLAUGHLIN, STALEY and ADAMS, Circuit Judges.

OPINION OF THE COURT

PER CURIAM.

We have carefully reviewed the record in this appeal. We are convinced that the district court committed no error in dismissing the complaint.

The judgment of the district court will be affirmed.
